articles.author: F1
articles.title: Verstappen admits first day in Canada 'not ideal' - F1 - The Official Home of Formula 1® Racing
articles.description: Max Verstappen stated that his opening day of practice for the Canadian Grand Prix was “definitely not how I would have liked to get on” after his efforts in mixed conditions were hindered by a technical problem.
articles.content:
I think it was overall a very tricky day with the conditions that we had, said the Mexican, with drivers also having to get used to a resurfaced track.
I think its going to be very important tomorro… [+679 chars]

articles.title: RBI announces digital payments intelligence platform to check online frauds - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This platform, leveraging advanced technologies, aims to mitigate payment fraud risks and enhance the safety of digital transactions.
articles.content: In a bid to bolster the safety and security of digital payments and enhance regulatory frameworks, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) unveiled a series of proposals aimed at fostering innovation, inclus… [+6034 chars]
